channel.title: openSUSE on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in openSUSE on Paul Cutler

item.title: Collaboration Across Borders
item.description: I’ve been a bit of a distro-hopper over the last year, but as I started interviewing at Novell earlier this year I started using openSUSE so I could pretend to know what I was talking about if it came up during the interview process. I’ve been really happy with openSUSE – each distro has their quirks but there’s a number of things (especially the openSUSE Build Service!) it does well.
